headline: Right Wing Round-Up: Worshippers of the Big Lie
author: Kyle Mantyla
sentences: Adam Klasfeld @ Law & Crime: Oath Keepers Founder’s Estranged Wife Tells Why She Asked a Judge to Keep Ex in Jail, Fears He’ll Take Their Kids and Become ‘Brownshirt’ for Trump.

Cameron Joseph @ Vice News: The Big Lie Is Turning Fringe Candidates Into MAGA Stars.
